data.title: Flying Health on LinkedIn: #digitaltherapeutics #digitalhealth #digitaltransformation #dtx…
data.meta_description: We are pleased to announce our partnership with Liva Healthcare, aiming to shape the future of personalized digital health coaching by accelerating their…
data.text:
📢 𝗟𝗼𝗼𝗸𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝘁𝗼 𝗿𝗲𝗹𝗶𝘃𝗲 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗯𝗲𝘀𝘁 𝗺𝗼𝗺𝗲𝗻𝘁𝘀 𝗼𝗳 𝗪𝗲𝗔𝗖𝗧 𝗖𝗼𝗻 𝟮𝟬𝟮𝟰? 🌱 Check out the video recap of the event and immerse yourself in the highlights, key insights, and discussions from this year's congress. 🎥 https://lnkd.in/exUPjMma The WeACT Con conference, initiated by our Flying Health partner Chiesi Deutschland, focuses on health, environment, and sustainability. It provides a platform for all stakeholders in the healthcare system to network, exchange best practices, and take action together. It's a fantastic initiative that we are proud to support. We are already looking forward to next year's continuation of this event. Dr. Sandra Kluge, Dr. med. Eckart von Hirschhausen, Yvonne Sieler, Hans-Jürgen Oberkönig, Julia Klein, Katharina Polydoros, Janine Helbing, Jenny Kossian, Falk Sommer, Dr. Renate Müller, Sophia Wagner, Dr. Albrecht Kloepfer, Marie-Claire Nielsen, Maurizio Bär, Dr. Rabea Stockert #WeACTCon2024 #GemeinsamWirken #healthcare #innovation #sustainability #greenhealth #nextgenerationhealthcare

🗓 𝗦𝗮𝘃𝗲 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗗𝗮𝘁𝗲: 𝗦𝗲𝗽𝘁𝗲𝗺𝗯𝗲𝗿 𝟭𝟬𝘁𝗵 – 𝗘𝘅𝗽𝗹𝗼𝗿𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗔𝗜’𝘀 𝗥𝗼𝗹𝗲 𝗶𝗻 𝗛𝗲𝗮𝗹𝘁𝗵𝗰𝗮𝗿𝗲! 🚀 Artificial Intelligence is poised to revolutionize healthcare, promising enhanced patient outcomes, improved quality of care, and greater operational efficiency. But does it truly deliver on its promise? Join us on September 10, 2024, at 6:30 PM CEST in Berlin, for our event, "AI in Healthcare - Between Ambition and Reality," hosted in collaboration with Merantix Momentum and Future4Care. Dive into the exciting world of AI in the healthcare sector and explore the transformative potential of AI technologies for the future. Our event will feature distinguished experts from various healthcare sectors who will discuss the current state of AI from regulatory, industry, payor, and provider perspectives. They will share concrete examples, highlighting both the success factors and pitfalls of implementing AI technology in their fields. Stay tuned for speaker announcements! 📣 Click here to register for the event ➡ https://lu.ma/jfa7t1le We look forward to your participation and an engaging exchange of ideas. If you have any questions about the event, please feel free to reach out to our principal, Karen Piontek. Merantix AI Campus #ai #artificialintelligence #machinelearning #llm #healthcare #nextgenerationhealthcare

📣 𝗢𝘂𝗿 𝗹𝗮𝘁𝗲𝘀𝘁 𝗗𝗶𝗴𝗶𝘁𝗮𝗹 𝗛𝗲𝗮𝗹𝘁𝗵 𝗝𝗼𝗯 𝗡𝗲𝘄𝘀𝗹𝗲𝘁𝘁𝗲𝗿 𝗶𝘀 𝗼𝗻𝗹𝗶𝗻𝗲! 📣 We are excited to share the latest and most compelling job vacancies and career profiles in the digital health sector, featuring opportunities from dynamic startups and established companies across Germany and Europe. ❗ 𝘿𝙤𝙣'𝙩 𝙢𝙞𝙨𝙨 𝙤𝙪𝙩! 𝙃𝙚𝙡𝙥 𝙪𝙨 𝙞𝙢𝙥𝙧𝙤𝙫𝙚 𝙮𝙤𝙪𝙧 𝙣𝙚𝙬𝙨𝙡𝙚𝙩𝙩𝙚𝙧 𝙚𝙭𝙥𝙚𝙧𝙞𝙚𝙣𝙘𝙚 ❗ To keep improving our newsletter and make sure it delivers the content you find valuable, we'd greatly appreciate your feedback in a 𝙦𝙪𝙞𝙘𝙠 4-𝙦𝙪𝙚𝙨𝙩𝙞𝙤𝙣 𝙨𝙪𝙧𝙫𝙚𝙮. It only takes a moment, and your insights will be instrumental in helping us better serve you. Click here to take the survey: https://lnkd.in/ebDcgbCU 👉 Follow us for biweekly updates on job offers and career opportunities within the German and European digital health scene. If you want to list your job offer in our Digital Health Job Newsletter: ➡️ Reach out to jobs@flyinghealth.com! #digitalhealth #healthcare #jobs #joboffers #applynow #careerchoice

🌟 𝗙𝗹𝘆𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗛𝗲𝗮𝗹𝘁𝗵 𝗧𝗲𝗮𝗺 𝗘𝘃𝗲𝗻𝗶𝗻𝗴 🌟 Last week, our team gathered in Berlin for a strategy day. Of course, we took the opportunity to enjoy a dinner together, stepping away from the office to connect, exchange ideas, and simply enjoy each other’s company. Moments like these not only strengthen our relationships but also make us an even stronger team. 💪🤝 We are proud to have a team that harmonizes not just professionally but personally as well. Here’s to many more successful projects and wonderful moments together! 🎉 PS: In Austria at the time and not in the picture, but always with us in our thoughts: Dr. Lena Kieseler. 💙 #TeamSpirit #StrongerTogether #CompanyCulture #TeamDinner #NexGenerationHealthcare

𝗗𝗿𝗶𝘃𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗙𝘂𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗲 𝗼𝗳 𝗛𝗲𝗮𝗹𝘁𝗵𝗰𝗮𝗿𝗲 𝘄𝗶𝘁𝗵 𝗔𝗜: AGAPLESION gAG “𝗞𝗜 𝗚𝗶𝗽𝗳𝗲𝗹” 🚀 We are excited to share that our Senior Consultant, Dr. Rabea Stockert, recently attended the Agaplesion KI Gipfel. This innovative event brought together interdisciplinary teams to explore the potential of AI in healthcare. With an inspiring keynote by Fabian Lechner and input from Google, Microsoft, IBM, and Siemens Healthineers, Rabea supported the interdisciplinary teams from Agaplesion as external expert in the identification of key areas where AI could enhance patient care and simplify internal processes. The event generated a wealth of innovative ideas that have the potential to bring huge advantages to Agaplesion employees and patients. Now, the challenge is to transform these ideas into reality. If you are interested in delving deeper into AI in healthcare, feel free to reach out to Rabea. A big thank you to Agaplesion for the invitation and organization of this successful day. #healthcare #AI #innovation #hospitals #nextgenerationhealthcare Claudia Möller, Sebastian Polag, Bettina Geißler-Nielsen, Jan Geesen, Marc Bastien, Matthias Bauer, Eric Ballnath, Jan-Peter Preuß, Alfred T., Sebastian Kühn, Sebastian Sahner 📸 by AGAPLESION gAG/Isabelle Jauernich

📢 𝗔𝗿𝗲 𝘆𝗼𝘂 𝗶𝗻𝘁𝗲𝗿𝗲𝘀𝘁𝗲𝗱 𝗶𝗻 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗶𝗻𝗰𝗲𝗻𝘁𝗶𝘃𝗲𝘀 𝗼𝗳 𝗱𝗶𝗴𝗶𝘁𝗮𝗹 𝗵𝗲𝗮𝗹𝘁𝗵 𝗮𝗽𝗽𝘀 𝗳𝗼𝗿 𝗽𝗵𝘆𝘀𝗶𝗰𝗶𝗮𝗻𝘀 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗽𝘀𝘆𝗰𝗵𝗼𝘁𝗵𝗲𝗿𝗮𝗽𝗶𝘀𝘁𝘀 𝗶𝗻 𝗚𝗲𝗿𝗺𝗮𝗻𝘆? 💡 Then you definitely must read the latest research article by our Head of Startups and M&A, Prof. Dr. Florian K. "𝘙𝘢𝘱𝘪𝘥 𝘳𝘦𝘷𝘪𝘦𝘸 𝘰𝘯 𝘵𝘩𝘦 𝘪𝘯𝘤𝘦𝘯𝘵𝘪𝘷𝘦𝘴 𝘰𝘧 𝘥𝘪𝘨𝘪𝘵𝘢𝘭 𝘩𝘦𝘢𝘭𝘵𝘩 𝘢𝘱𝘱𝘴 𝘧𝘰𝘳 𝘱𝘩𝘺𝘴𝘪𝘤𝘪𝘢𝘯𝘴 𝘢𝘯𝘥 𝘱𝘴𝘺𝘤𝘩𝘰𝘵𝘩𝘦𝘳𝘢𝘱𝘪𝘴𝘵𝘴: 𝘈 𝘎𝘦𝘳𝘮𝘢𝘯 𝘱𝘦𝘳𝘴𝘱𝘦𝘤𝘵𝘪𝘷𝘦." Together with his co-authors, Prof. Dr. Cordula Kreuzenbeck, Prof. Dr. Brit Schneider, and Prof. Dr. Sophie Brenner, Florian presents the following key findings: 🔹 User experience and costs are major barriers for physicians and psychotherapists when considering prescribing a DiGA. 🔹 The DiGA prescription and activation process should be made easier for HCPs as well as patients. #ERezept 🔹 Additionally, there is a need for improved capturing and communication of the (health economic) value of DiGAs. Here is the link to the article: https://lnkd.in/e4i-8_Qv If you are interested in this topic, feel free to contact Florian. He looks forward to engaging with you. 🤝 #DigitalHealth #DiGA #eHealth #MedicalResearch #HealthTech #nextgenerationhealthcare

📢 𝗘𝘅𝗰𝗶𝘁𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗘𝘃𝗲𝗻𝘁 𝗔𝗹𝗲𝗿𝘁 𝗳𝗼𝗿 𝗮𝗻𝘆𝗼𝗻𝗲 𝗶𝗻𝘃𝗼𝗹𝘃𝗲𝗱 𝘄𝗶𝘁𝗵 𝘄𝗼𝗿𝗸𝗳𝗼𝗿𝗰𝗲 𝗽𝗹𝗮𝗻𝗻𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗶𝗻 𝗚𝗲𝗿𝗺𝗮𝗻 𝗛𝗼𝘀𝗽𝗶𝘁𝗮𝗹𝘀! 🏥 Our Flying Health partner ATOSS Software SE is hosting a free Online Summit on August 7, 2024, starting at 9:30 AM. The focus will be on efficiently implementing the PPR 2.0 nursing staff assessment in clinical practice. On July 1, 2024, the Nursing Staff Assessment Regulation (PPBV) came into effect for all hospitals in Germany, making PPR 2.0 mandatory nationwide. Hospitals must now determine, and report staffing needs and actual staffing levels and demonstrate compliance with minimum staffing requirements on all wards by October 1, 2024. Join the digital PPR 2.0 Summit for exclusive expert insights: 🔹 Recommendations for process design 🔹 Implementation tips 🔹 The importance of system interoperability in patient and staff planning 🔹 Practical experiences Learn more and register now: https://lnkd.in/eNFQAFpt #healthcare #digitalhealth #ATOSS #pflege #ppr2 #pflegemanagement #Pflegepersonalbemessungsverordnung

🏥 𝗪𝗵𝗮𝘁 𝗱𝗼𝗲𝘀 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗵𝗼𝘀𝗽𝗶𝘁𝗮𝗹 𝗼𝗳 𝟮𝟬𝟰𝟬 𝗹𝗼𝗼𝗸 𝗹𝗶𝗸𝗲? 💡 This question is thoroughly explored in the book "Das Krankenhaus der Zukunft – Herausforderungen, Chancen, Innovationen." Featuring over 50 contributions from leading healthcare experts, the book highlights the major trends and transformations anticipated in the coming years. The focus is on the opportunities and potential of reimagined healthcare. In their insightful contribution, our Principal Alexander Whyte, together with Laura Wamprecht, delves into the pivotal role startups can play in this transformation. We firmly believe that startups are crucial in addressing the central challenges of sustainability, digitalization, and financing in the hospital landscape. Are you a startup struggling to get your product working for the hospital market in Germany? Reach out to Alex and speak to our team of experts. You can get the book in both print and eBook formats here: https://lnkd.in/d9fied-y We look forward to your feedback. A big thank you to the editors, Dr. rer. pol. Gerald Gaß, Prof. Dr. Henriette Neumeyer, MD, MBA, and Ingo Morell, for their initiative and to all the contributors for their inspiring insights. MWV Medizinisch Wissenschaftliche Verlagsgesellschaft #healthcare #digitalhealth #hostpitals #innovation

🚀 𝗪𝗲'𝗿𝗲 𝗛𝗶𝗿𝗶𝗻𝗴: 𝗝𝘂𝗻𝗶𝗼𝗿 𝗛𝗲𝗮𝗹𝘁𝗵𝗰𝗮𝗿𝗲 𝗖𝗼𝗻𝘀𝘂𝗹𝘁𝗮𝗻𝘁 (𝗺/𝗳/𝘅) 🚀 Are you passionate about healthcare and eager to kickstart your career in consulting? Join our dynamic team and help us shape the future of healthcare. 🤝 🔹 Position: Junior Healthcare Consultant, German speaking (m/f/x) 🔹 Type: Full Time 🔹 Location: Berlin / hybrid Check out the full job description at ⤵ https://lnkd.in/dnqY8sNR If you have any questions, feel free to contact our Princpipal Alexander Whyte. We look forward to hearing from you! #nextgenerationhealthcare #consulting #healthcare #joboffer #hiring

𝗪𝗵𝗮𝘁 𝗱𝗼𝗲𝘀 𝗱𝗶𝗴𝗶𝘁𝗮𝗹𝗶𝘇𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻 𝗹𝗼𝗼𝗸 𝗹𝗶𝗸𝗲 𝗶𝗻 𝗴𝗲𝗻𝗲𝗿𝗮𝗹 𝗽𝗿𝗮𝗰𝘁𝗶𝗰𝗲? This question is at the heart of the "Praxissalon" evenings organized by the Deutsches Ärzteblatt across various practices in Germany. During these events, the hosting physician provides participating colleagues with insights into how they integrate digital tools into their practice. This is followed by an in-depth discussion, allowing for a rich exchange of experiences. Last week, the event, moderated by our colleague Dr. Edda Eggers, was hosted by Dr. med. Marc Hanefeld in Bremervörde. Dr. Hanefeld demonstrated how he has strategically restructured and digitalized his practice's workflows since taking over in recent years. The improved workflow has significantly enhanced the work of the entire team, with medical assistants particularly appreciating the digital advancements. For more details, check out the report on the Ärzteblatt website: https://lnkd.in/eSivrNvf A big thank you to Dr. Marc Hanefeld for opening his practice and to all the attendees for the engaging exchange. We are already looking forward to the next event. 📸 Participants of the Praxissalon in Bremervörde /picture-alliance, Ulrich Perrey
